title: Pre-processing of 10X Single-Cell ATAC-seq Datasets
questions: What are single-cell ATAC fragments and MTX files?
What is an Anndata file, and why is it important?
objectives: Demultiplex single-cell FASTQ data from 10X Genomics
Create a high-quality count matrix starting from scATAC-seq FASTQ files
key_points: Bulk ATAC-seq like mapping and peak calling
Creating a scATAC-seq count matrix requires positions of open chromatin regions

workflows.name: scATAC-seq Count Matrix Filtering
workflows.title: scATAC-seq Count Matrix Filtering

workflows.name: scATAC-seq FASTQ to Count Matrix
workflows.title: scATAC-seq FASTQ to Count Matrix
